name: externship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
as part of a period of study, a period of time during which a student works for a company or organization in order to get experience of a particular type of work: The course offers students the possibility of externships with local businesses. Her externship in a pharmacy has definitely influenced her decision about her future career.
More examplesFewer examplesThe college runs a summer externship programme with legal firms in the city.I learned so much about the restaurant business from my externship.I did a two-month externship in an architecture firm.
